lead_paragraph: Roger Federer battled past Serbian Novak Djokovic 6-3, 5-7, 7-5, 6-2, on Saturday to reach the final of the U.S. Open for the fifth successive year.
snippet: Roger Federer battled past Serbian Novak Djokovic 6-3, 5-7, 7-5, 6-2, on Saturday to reach the final of the U.S. Open for the fifth successive year.
